TRID.name: TRID (TILA-RESPA Integrated Disclosure)
TRID.description: Truth in Lending Act and Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act integrated disclosure rule

loan_estimate.description: Loan Estimate must be provided within 3 business days of application
loan_estimate.remediation: Issue Loan Estimate within required timeframe

closing_disclosure.description: Closing Disclosure must be provided 3 business days before closing
closing_disclosure.remediation: Deliver Closing Disclosure and wait 3 business days before closing

intent_to_proceed.description: Intent to Proceed must be obtained before charging fees
intent_to_proceed.remediation: Obtain documented intent to proceed before charging fees

adverse_action_notice.description: Adverse Action Notice required for denials
adverse_action_notice.remediation: Provide required adverse action notice to applicant

equal_credit_opportunity_notice.remediation: Supply Equal Credit Opportunity notice to applicant

marital_status.description: Marital status cannot be used for credit decisions
marital_status.remediation: Remove marital status from underwriting considerations

race.description: Race cannot be used for credit decisions
race.remediation: Eliminate race from credit decision data

religion.description: Religion cannot be used for credit decisions
religion.remediation: Exclude religion from credit decision data

good_faith_estimate.remediation: Provide Good Faith Estimate to borrower

referral_fees.description: Referral fees may violate RESPA kickback prohibitions

privacy_notice_provided.description: Privacy notice must be provided to customers

opt_out_mechanism.description: Opt-out mechanism must be provided for information sharing
opt_out_mechanism.remediation: Offer opt-out mechanism for information sharing

adverse_action_notice.description: Adverse Action Notice required for credit denials
adverse_action_notice.remediation: Provide adverse action notice to consumer

risk_based_pricing_notice.remediation: Send risk-based pricing notice when applicable

AML_BSA.name: AML/BSA (Anti-Money Laundering/Bank Secrecy Act)
AML_BSA.description: Prevents money laundering and terrorist financing

suspicious_activity_reviewed.description: Suspicious activity must be reviewed for AML compliance

customer_due_diligence.description: Customer Due Diligence must be performed
customer_due_diligence.remediation: Perform and document customer due diligence

unlicensed_originator.description: Loan originator must be licensed under SAFE Act
unlicensed_originator.remediation: Ensure loan originator obtains and maintains required licensing
